Summary: Flash of bright lights with several military airplanes in area
trends: There have been no other sightings in Black River Falls
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi believe it was just after dinner, when my dog started barking at the back door of the house i was in around the black river falls area. he usually is alerted to sounds, like vehicles, etc. so we thought someone had drivin up to the house or there was an animal outside. i went to the back door, and heard air planes overhead. the planes were quite loud, so myself and my dog along with my dad and his girlfriend went outside. we saw that the planes were flying very low. at different times we saw up to 5 airplanes in the sky from the northwest to the southeast of the house. so approximately 50% of the 360 degree view around the house had some activity in it. after watching the planes circle around the sky in the same general area flying low and loud, we saw off across the field in a tree line to the northeast a flash of 4 plus bright orange\yellow lights in a row. the lights were steady, they did not ascend or descend and were gone within a few seconds. all three of us witnessed the lights, and we were like "what was that?" at first i thought it might have been a plane, however there was no way that a plane would be that steady in the sky for that long of a period without moving from its current location. the object appeared to be at an angle from us, so when we saw the flash of lights again, but more south and west of the original siteing it seemed that there might be more than 4 lights. these lights were about 50 times brighter than the lights off of a plane, and were lower in the sky that the other aircraft we saw. upon seeing the lights several more times, they seem to get further away from our original location where we saw them. they moved more west and a little more south. after the frequency of the seeing the bright lights had tappered off and the aircraft had moved further west along with the bright lights, we got in our vehicle and headed west to see if we could see anything more. in the general area, you can see several towers with red lights, but none of these were anything like the bright flashes of lights we saw from this unknown object and they were verticle lights, not horizontal as these lights were. i am unsure how i really felt, as i had heard about different experiences from others and have often dis-believed their merit. however, this is unexplained. after i relayed the story to my brother, he thought that what we saw might have been a military maneuver called counter measures. he showed me some pictures from google.com, however, all of these pictures showed that the counter measures would descend and fade out. these lights did neither. at the beginning and at the end the intensity of their brightness did not fade or go any lower in the sky. it was as if a light switch was turned off and on, the objects were stationary and instantly intense and then instantly off after a few seconds. after we had driven the area, about 5 miles from the original location of the siteing, and saw no more flashes we were not sure what to think. we did notice that there was a lot of airplane traffic in the area, from high flying jets to small aircraft. it was a clear evening, so it was easy to see these known and unknow aircrafts in the sky.
